imdb.plot outline: "Havoc on the 101" is a new interactive music video show on DirecTV's Channel 101. It integrates SMS text-to-screen and text voting with alternative and underground music videos. "Havoc on the 101" is split into four different types of episodes: "Havoc Mixtape"; "Havoc Alternative"; "Havoc Vinyl"; and "Havoc Sports".
imdb.title: Havoc on the 101
plot: "_Havoc on the 101_ (qv)" is a new interactive music video show on DirecTV's Channel 101. It integrates SMS text-to-screen and text voting with alternative and underground music videos. "_Havoc on the 101_ (qv)" is split into four different types of episodes: "Havoc Mixtape"; "Havoc Alternative"; "Havoc Vinyl"; and "Havoc Sports".::Anonymous
